CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local ret = BehaviourTreeStatus.Failure
if self.ParentAI.time >= 1 then local CanChasePlayerNum = self.ParentAI.CanChasePlayerNum
if CanChasePlayerNum > 0 then local MonsterEntity = self.ParentAI.Entity local ChasePlayer = nil
ChasePlayer = self:ClosestPlayerSearch(MonsterEntity)
if ChasePlayer == nil then return ret else self.ParentAI.time = 0
local PlayerPos = ChasePlayer.TransformComponent.Position local MonsterPos = MonsterEntity.TransformComponent.Position
MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("CHASE")
if PlayerPos.x > MonsterPos.x then MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(1, 0), 0) else MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = false MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-1, 0), 0) end
log("chase")
ret = BehaviourTreeStatus.Success end end end
return ret

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ClosestPlayerSearch
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local CanChasePlayers = self.ParentAI.CanChasePlayers local MinDistance = 99999999 local ClosestPlayer = nil
local MonsterPos = MonsterEntity.TransformComponent.Position:Clone() MonsterPos.z = 0
for name, entity in pairs(CanChasePlayers) do local PlayerPos = entity.TransformComponent.Position:Clone() local distance = 0
PlayerPos.z = 0
distance = Vector3.Distance(MonsterPos, PlayerPos)
if distance < MinDistance then MinDistance = distance ClosestPlayer = entity end end
return ClosestPlayer
